REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0773 reute d f BC-MEDI-RX-UNIT-IN-PROPO 03-06 0077

TEXT.TITLE: MEDI-RX UNIT IN PROPOSED INITIAL OFFERING
TEXT.BODY: Medi-Rx America Inc said its Rx Plus Inc subsidiary received a letter of intent for a proposed initial public offering of four mln dlrs to six mln dlrs. It also said the subisidary, formed to franchise retail drug stores, recently placed a 1.2 mln dlrs equity offering with private investors and secured a one mln dlrs line of credit for assisting applications for a Rx Plus franchise. Reuter
